name: Ancient Spider
description:
This is a casual game of Solitaire elimination.

Main gameplay:
1. Take the opened card at the bottom of the game interface as the first card. If the opened card in the upper card area is adjacent to it, you can click to take it back. Only one card at a time can be taken back, and so on until all the cards in the upper card area are collected. The cards are retracted.
2. If there is no card adjacent to the recovered card in the upper card area, the unopened card below can be turned over as the first card to replace the previous card.
3. Elimination cards can eliminate the cards of the same suit in the upper card area, and the universal cards can turn the first card into any card face and take back any card.
4. Continuous Solitaire eliminates the cards of the same suit, and the reward will be increased.

Features: When the crops are mature, they can be exchanged for gold coins.
